content: Is it possible to set the search function so that results with "FleetComplete" are also displayed when searching for "fleet"?

@Fabian Tribrunner good question. @Mohit Gupta might know whether we can easily tweak the Postgres stemming algorithm to split words in camel case in a meaningful way. (He's doing a similar tweak to improve search for URLs)
I will complete that. Facing some Development env. Issue but it should be doable. But we should make it optional and not global in my opinion.

I think it would be very helpful if it could be like "fleet*" and all results with fleetXYZ will be displayed.
If using "*fleet" all with XYZfleet will be displayed.

We need to be thoughtful about that sort of thing; once one allows wildcards like that, it's much harder for the search system to do proper indexing, so one might end up needing the search the user's entire message history. Potentially still a feature worth having ... but it might be 10x slower than normal search.
